attributes.action: To change the laws on Undocumented Migrants given the current pandemic & Brexit
attributes.additional_details:
Undocumented Migrants are suffering as they have no access to adequate financial support or any help from anywhere. 
The Government should grant Amnesty once forever given the Brexit context too as this is ever happening in the living history of the UK politics & afterward the UK will make its own laws on Human Rights and there will be no encouragement to successors to pursue Amnesty Route.
attributes.background: The Government should grant an  Amnesty to those who are in the UK for 10years illegally with no criminal record so that they could live their lives as normal human beings and pay tax to help the UK economy. Undocumented Migrants Must pay a higher tax for 5 Years than normal to support UK Economy

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567681
